Package smtools.math.quadmapping

Provides an implementation for perspective mappings of convex 2D quadrilaterals.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
QuadMapping The QuadMapping class provides a perspective mapping for a convex quadrilateral.
Quadrilateral The Quadrilateral class provides a container for a 2D quadrilateral.
QuadToQuadMapping The QuadToQuadMapping class provides a perspective mapping between two convex quadrilaterals.
 

Package smtools.math.quadmapping Description

Provides an implementation for perspective mappings of convex 2D quadrilaterals.

This package allows a perspective mapping of convex 2D quadrilaterals.
